text: Juan Carlos Masnik (2 March 1943 - 23 February 2021) was an Uruguayan football player and manager. He represented his country at the 1974 FIFA World Cup in Germany. He played for the national team from 1967 to 1974 making 33 appearances. Masnik was born in Soriano, Uruguay. Masnik died on 23 February 2021 in Montevideo, aged 77.Muere el uruguayo Juan Masnik, campeón de la Libertadores y compañero de Pelé ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Uruguayan football managers
title: Juan Carlos Masnik
